# NGINX

# Configuration

# Enable



 

web-servers:
    nginx:
        enabled: true

# Disable



 

web-servers:
    nginx:
        enabled: false

# Commands

# start_nginx

# restart_nginx

# stop_nginx

# reload_nginx

# nginx_status

# edit_nginx_conf

# edit_nginx_site_conf

# delete_nginx_site_conf
